data.title: comorian
data.text:
Famille

The mahorais, also called shimahorais or shimaory, is one of the two main languages spoken on the island of Mayotte (in addition to French which is the official language). It is a Bantu language, related to Swahili, while Shibushi is an Austronesian language close to the languages spoken in Madagascar.

Source : French Wikipedia

alphabet arabe

alphabet latin

Nombre d'article TresorDeLaParole

Trésors de la parole

type : Audio

The theme of the tale is that of the tree or stick changed into a woman, very popular in the Comoros. Part of the tale is sung in makua from Mozambique.
